title: 60s/70s/disco typeface
content:
It looks like a revival to me rather than an original. I’ve scoured myfonts and my other usual resources to no avail.

I’m wondering if the typeface in the logo is merely a lighter weight of the same face or a different face. I’m not seeing enough cues to be sure.

Any insight appreciated! Thanks.
